name: Sir K and bro
greetingText:
Sorry, I forgot to wish you guys on your day
Luckly there're still few mins left.
wishText: Happy Birthday to you, Unique twins !🎂🎉🥳 Go forward in everything you do! My greetings!🥂🍾🥳 I wish you good health and lots of love💖 in your life's 🚤journey. Wishing you many blissful years to come! 🥳🎂😘Enjoy your big day! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you kehinde and ur brother. ! wullnp blah  blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are guys are Special to me
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
